articles.author: Science X
articles.title: American mink regrow their brains in a rare reversal of the domestication process - Phys.org
articles.description: Farm animals look different from their wild counterparts in many ways, and one difference is consistent: their brains are smaller than those of their ancestors. From sheep to pigs to cows, domesticated animals have smaller relative brain sizes compared to the…
